document_data.name: Slobberchops
document_data.mainbody: '''Slobberchops''' was the pet [[tressym]] of the [[Vanthampur]] family from [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tressym had a mean appearance, with multiple scars and a bobbed tail.
document_data.Personality: Slobberchops had no feeling of loyalty toward the Vanthampurs. It particularly disliked [[Thurstwell Vanthampur]] and his [[imp]] spies. Such was Slobberchops's contempt for its masters that it eagerly followed and helped any visitor who offered it food, warning them of potential dangers within [[Vanthampur Villa]].
document_data.Abilities: Like all tressym, Slobberchops had the ability to see [[Invisibility|invisible]] creatures and objects, an ability that was frequently used to spot hidden imps.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{BG-DiA-time}} Slobberchops lived in the villa's kitchen, feeding off [[rat]]s and scraps. The tressym was depicted in numerous family paintings and was featured in a lifelike statue at the villa's gallery.
